text: Mihai Romilă (1 October 1950 – 27 June 2020) was a Romanian football midfielder. Romilă played 18 matches at international level for Romania, including appearances at Euro 1976 and 1980 qualifiers and at the World Cup 1978 qualifiers. Romilă also played one game for Romania's Olympic team at the 1976 Summer Olympics qualifiers. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Romanian footballers
title: Mihai Romilă
